name: Flux Finance
description: Flux Finance is a decentralized lending protocol built by the Ondo Finance team. Similar to version 2 of Compound Finance, it also supports permissionless (e.g. USDC) and permissioned (e.g. OUSG) tokens. Flux enables overcollateralized lending and borrowing in a peer-to-pool model.
